ruleContent.content:
eval(eval(result.match(/(eval.*?\))\s*<\//)[1].replace(/^eval/,'')).replace(/;.+/,''))
java.log('key:'+guidkey)

cid=result.match(/cid\s*=\s*(\d+)/)[1]
java.log('cid:'+cid)

imagecount=result.match(/imagecount\s*=\s*(\d+)/)[1]


url=baseUrl+'chapterimagefun.ashx?d='+new Date()+","

body='cid='+cid+'&page=1&key='+guidkey+'&showcount=5'

options={
"method":"post",
"X-Requested-With":"XMLHttpRequest",
"headers": {"Referer": baseUrl,"Cookie":"showcount=5; norefresh=true; autosize=false"},
"body": String(body)
}

response=String(java.ajax(url+JSON.stringify(options)))

if(response){
eval(response)
picarr=dm5imagefun()
java.log('å›¾ç‰‡æ€»æ•°:'+imagecount)
java.log('è¯·æ±‚å›¾ç‰‡æ€»æ•°'+picarr.length)
picarr.map(a=>'').join("\n")}else{"å›¾ç‰‡é˜²ç›—äº†"}
